Noxious 3 [i](Whenever this creature becomes blocked, defending player gets three poison counters.)[/i]
Whenever Avidim, Broken Cirque attacks, you may sacrifice a creature. If you do, proliferate, then proliferate again. [i](To proliferate, choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)[/i]
